entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
